title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Field Trip Options: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site welcomes school groups for ranger-guided tours of the site. Depending on class size, students can tour Launch Control Facility Delta-01 and/or Launch Facility (missile silo) Delta-09!  How to Schedule a Tour:  When planning a field trip to Minuteman Missile please keep in mind the following: 1) On-site educational tours should be scheduled at least two weeks in advance. 2) These programs are offered from the start of October through the end of April 3) There are no charge for these tours. 4) For reservations, please call Park Ranger Alison Shoup at (605) 433-5552 (Ext. 1242).  To learn what is best for your particular class size click on one of the links below.  Class sizes of 18 or less! Class sizes of 19 or more!         Results  There are no results to show.
